lines.text:
[singing]
Now we'll dig a hole where / both of us can hide. / Nobody will find us / while we're here inside.

[singing]
Nobody's sweeter. Come and kiss me, Rita. Tickle, tickle!
Stop that now!

[singing]
Nobody's sweeter. Come and kiss me, Rita. Tickle...
Will you stop that?

[singing]
Come and help me dig now / right here in the ground. We've got lots of work. No / time to play around.

[singing]
Nobody is sweeter. Kissy, kissy, kiss...
You big strong pigs aren't afraid of dogs, are ya?
Of course not. Why should we be?
Exactly my point! There's no reason at all, because you're big beautiful animals!
There's no such thing as a three-headed dragon!
Yeah. I found that out.
Listen! My stomach is asking me when we're gonna eat! What will I tell it? It needs food!

[singing]
Now, we've got a hole that / we can call our own. / We'll stay close together / and make this our home.

[singing]
Nobody's sweeter. Come and kiss me, Rita. Tickle, tickle!
Stop that now!

[singing]
Nobody's sweeter. Come and kiss me, Rita. Tickle!
Will you stop?

[singing]
Look, I found these coushins. / They feel soft and so warm! / We'll be nice and cozy / through the winter storm. / Snuggle up beside me. / Sit right here on the seat. / Lay back, put your head down, / rest your tired feet.

[singing]
Nobody is sweeter. Kissy, kissy, kiss...
